problem.p: A projectile is launched at an angle from the ground level over a flat terrain. The horizontal range of the projectile is five times the maximum height of the flight.
Consider the angle \(\theta\) that the initial velocity vector makes with the ground. What statement about angle \(\theta\) is correct?
Which of the following statements about \(\theta\) is correct?

choicegroup.choice: The information given in the problem is sufficient to calculate \(\theta\)
Knowing the initial speed only is sufficient to calculate \(\theta\)
Knowing the acceleration due to gravity only is sufficient to calculate \(\theta\)
Knowing both the initial speed and the acceleration due to gravity is necessary to calculate \(\theta\)
